content.text:
Here is my attempt at an improved version of the task description for a Customer Service Representative:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
TASK â€“ Promptly respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or chat to provide helpful information, solutions, or updates. Proactively communicate with customers to notify them of the status of their claims, orders, requests, or accounts. Demonstrate empathy, patience and a commitment to delivering excellent customer service with every interaction.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
